content:
IValidationErrorService Interface

Definition

Defines ways to access a specified list of activity validation errors.

In this Article

public interface IValidationErrorService

Methods

ShowValidationErrors(IList<ValidationErrorInfo>)

Makes the indicated list of activity validation errors accessible through a specific implementation.

public void ShowValidationErrors (System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Activities.Presentation.Validation.ValidationErrorInfo> errors);
errors
IList<ValidationErrorInfo>

A specified type of list that contains activity validation errors.
